arts.sum: BRENDAN RODGERS takes his Celtic players to Ibrox this afternoon for the first Glasgow derby of the season. The champions won the corresponding fixture 3-0 at Parkhead last year and an action replay would be most welcome as the Hoops look to maintain their 100 per cent league record. Rodgers’ men have already overcome St [...]

arts.ttl: Celtic XI vs Rangers – Predicted lineup and team news
arts.sum: The 2025/26 Scottish Premiership season heats up with a highly charged Old Firm showdown as Celtic face Rangers at the iconic Ibrox Stadium in Glasgow this Sunday.
